'''Kusi''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The girl panting before you, draped in tattered Roparu robes, bears a few bruises and cuts but looks otherwise unharmed. Beads of sweat comingle with trickling blood on her forehead.

Finally relaxing, she lowers the sword she's been swinging, letting the edge rest in the dirt. The pommel bears the form of a dog's head.}}

Kusi has tried clearing [the Gullet](/theGullet/) of a pack of skuldr that have been preying on people for weeks, using a sword left to her by her father, promising she'd use it one day to defend the Deadfire. What he neglected to mention was the fact that she'd also need training to use it effectively.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Kusi is encountered at random while travelling through [Neketaka](/neketaka/), fighting off a pack of [Skuldr](/skuldr/). She will offer you [Griffin's Blade](/griffinsBlade/) if you managed to save her or will drop it if she didn't survive.
** Saving Kusi leads to some extra dialogue. To keep her alive, use several casts of [Withdraw](/withdrawDeadfire/), [Scroll of Withdraw](/scrollOfWithdraw/), or another spell that makes her untargetable.
** One of the script choices before the fight draws foes' attention away from her (requires [Athletics](/athletics/) 6) and gives Moderate Positive: Neketaka. Passing this check causes a single tough skuldr to continue attacking her.
}}

## Notes

* Kusi can be hard to see, so use the Tab key to find her friendly blue circle.
